detail:
野島一人（本名は　矢野　健二）、日本の小説家、脚本家。

KADOKAWA所属。『MGS』シリーズを徹底解剖した単行本、『METAL GEAR SOLID naked』や、伊藤計劃氏、長谷敏司氏、野島一人氏による『MGS』のノベライズの企画・編集を手掛ける。Web番組コジマ・ステーションにもたびたび出演し、鋭い考察でシリーズを解説。

2016年7月，小島工作室正式在社交媒體上宣佈，矢野健二加入工作室，負責宣傳和社區溝通等方面的工作。

Hitori Nojima (野島一人 Nojima Hitori) was a pen name used by author Kenji Yano for a series of Metal Gear novelizations published by Kadokawa Shoten in Japan between 2014 and 2015. Initially his true identity was unknown and for a while it was suspected that the pen name actually belonged to Hideo Kojima himself due to the similarities of their names, although this was later debunked in an interview. Nojima's true identity was later revealed after being credited on the teaser trailer for Death Stranding, Kojima Productions' upcoming collaboration with Sony Interactive Entertainment, following its unveiling in E3 2016.
